verbs.name: not set
verbs.description: no verb / predicate selected

verbs.name: is a
verbs.description: the main child to parent relation e.g. Zurich is a Canton. The reverse is valid and usually plural is used e.g. Cantons are Zurich, Bern, ...

verbs.name: is part of
verbs.description: if several similar term create different views to the same sum; E.g. Cash Flow Paper, Balance Sheet and Income statement are Financial Statements. Or Sectors and Regions are different splittings

verbs.name: of
verbs.description: to narrow a selection e.g. the world population is usually the population of all humans

verbs.name: with
verbs.description: similar to 'is part of' but where the left phrase is expected to be several times the right phrase e.g. for comparing same by same: 1 hour with full load is the same as 2 hours with half load

verbs.name: is time jump for
verbs.description: is the default time jump for

verbs.name: is term jump for
verbs.description: is the default term jump for

verbs.name: term type needed
verbs.description: the formula needs the linked term type

verbs.name: is follower of
verbs.description: is follower of

verbs.name: uses
verbs.description: real use e.g. wind energy is used by a wind turbine

verbs.name: is measure type for
verbs.description: is the default measure type for

verbs.name: is an acronym for
verbs.description: is an acronym for

verbs.name: can be used as a differentiator for
verbs.description: similar to contains, but in a table view the row will not be shown if there is no corresponding value
verbs.name_plural: can be used as a differentiator for

verbs.name: can
verbs.description: to assign a behavior e.g. GDP can decline

verbs.name: can use
verbs.description: use indicates that a new result is created e.g. a turbine can use water or wind or any type of liquid or gas to convert energy

verbs.name: scaled by
verbs.description: to define the usual scaling e.g. for watt hours usually the scaling kilo (kWh) is used

verbs.name: per
verbs.description: to define the usual quotient e.g. meter per second is normally used not seconds per meter, that why the reverse name is empty

verbs.name: is selector for
verbs.description: used to group a selection list to make it shorter

verbs.name: is symbol for
verbs.description: is used as a symbol for

verbs.name: can cause
verbs.description: there is a causal relation with a factor

verbs.name: and
verbs.description: combine two phrases a a new phrase
